snippet: Conversations with dozens of parishioners at three largely Spanish-speaking churches in Los Angeles illustrate how divided the faithful still are over the details of decades of abuse.
abstract: Conversations with dozens of parishioners at three largely Spanish-speaking churches in Los Angeles illustrate how divided the faithful still are over details of decades of abuse and way church officials have handled scandal; many wonder if Cardinal Roger M Mahony is hero or someone who deserves to be punished.

byline.original: By JENNIFER MEDINA and IAN LOVETT

lead_paragraph: Conversations with dozens of parishioners at three largely Spanish-speaking churches in Los Angeles illustrate how divided the faithful still are over the details of decades of abuse.

headline.seo: Hispanic Parishioners Grapple With Church Scandal
headline.main: Sexual Abuse Scandal Grips and Divides Hispanic Parishioners in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: Sexual Abuse Scandal Grips and Divides Hispanic Parishioners in Los Angeles
